answers.answer: Hello,Recurrent urine infections could be due to various reasons. Most common cause is stones in kidney which is blocking urine pathway. Other causes are changing sexual partners frequently, diabetes and of course childhood infections. The urine can also be due to retention of urine anywhere in its flow due t obstruction. The obstruction can be due to abnormality of structures since birth, stones or diseases like tumors. So you should get a ultrasound, CT scan done and also some urine and blood tests like urine culture.Till then drink plenty of fluids and start with the antibiotics after getting a urine culture report to the antibiotics to which the infection is sensitive.I hope it helps. It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: I have had UTI about 10 times this year and a yeast infection about 4 times.I went to a physician, who told me that I should take cranberry pills and drink cranberry juice. I also was given pills for yeast infection.Last week, my UTI got so bad that the pain was almost unbearable and I was urinating almost completely blood. My urine had some specimen in it. I went to the Emergency Room as soon as I noticed the blood. I was unable to get off the toilet - I urinated little amounts of blood about every ten seconds. After about 3 hours in the ER the doctor told me it was a reoccurring bacteria and should be gone in 3 days. I was told to take a medication twice a day for 7 days. It was been 8 days, I took all the medication and the pain has gone down, but it is still very uncomfortable - and I still have a burning sensation when I urinate (no more blood though).Please tell me what else I can do - or should do. I took all my medication, cranberry pills and juice, and make sure to urinate immediately after sexual intercourse. I dont know why these infections keep coming - and the doctor said they would be gone by now.
title: UTI - Please Help
